resources.string: Drinking at least 8 glasses of water a day is essential for maintaining good health and hydration. Make sure to drink water regularly throughout the day, monitor the quality of your drinking water, and avoid relying on sugary drinks. During exercise, drink water before, during, and after to stay hydrated, and watch for signs of dehydration. Avoid overhydration as it can be dangerous. In addition to drinking enough water, it is important to pay attention to the quality of your drinking water.
Click the date to see your daily water consumption
